entry.title: Template: Post Manga1
entry.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html b:version='2' class='v2' expr:dir='data:blog.languageDirection' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml' xmlns:b='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/b' xmlns:data='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/data' xmlns:expr='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/expr'>
<head>
<!-- [ Meta Tag SEO from Arlinadzgn] -->
<!--[if lt IE 9]><script src="//html5shiv.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/html5.js"> </script><![endif]-->
<meta charset='utf-8'/>
<b:if cond='data:blog.pageType in {"index"} and data:blog.homepageUrl == data:blog.url'>
<title><data:blog.pageTitle/></title>
<b:else/>
<b:if cond='data:blog.pageType in {"item","static_page"}'>
<title><data:blog.pageName/> | <data:blog.title/></title>
<b:else/>
<b:if cond='data:blog.pageType in {"index"} and data:blog.pageName == ""'>
<title>All Posts | <data:blog.title/></title>
<b:else/>
<b:if cond='data:blog.pageType in {"error_page"}'>
<title>Page Not Found | <data:blog.title/></title>
<b:else/>
<title><data:blog.pageName/></title>
</b:if>
</b:if>
</b:if>
</b:if>
<meta content='width=device-width,initial-scale=1,minimum-scale=1,maximum-scale=1' name='viewport'/>
<meta content='IE=edge,chrome=1' http-equiv='X-UA-Compatible'/>
<meta content='blogger' name='generator'/>
<meta content='text/html; charset=UTF-8' http-equiv='Content-Type'/>
<meta content='xxxxx' name='geo.placename'/>
<meta content='xxxxx' name='Author'/>
<meta content='general' name='rating'/>
<meta content='id' name='geo.country'/>
<link href='/favicon.ico' rel='icon' type='image/x-icon'/>
<b:if cond='data:blog.pageType == "item"'><b:if cond='data:blog.postImageThumbnailUrl'><link expr:href='data:blog.postImageThumbnailUrl' rel='image_src'/></b:if></b:if>
<link expr:href='data:blog.url' rel='canonical'/>
<link expr:href='data:blog.homepageUrl + "feeds/posts/default"' expr:title='data:blog.title + " - Atom"' rel='alternate' type='application/atom+xml'/>
<link expr:href='data:blog.homepageUrl + "feeds/posts/default?alt=rss"' expr:title='data:blog.title + " - RSS"' rel='alternate' type='application/rss+xml'/>
<link expr:href='"http://www.blogger.com/feeds/" + data:blog.blogId + "/posts/default"' expr:title='data:blog.title + " - Atom"' rel='service.post' type='application/atom+xml'/>
<link href='http://www.blogger.com/openid-server.g' rel='openid.server'/>
<link expr:href='data:blog.homepageUrl' rel='openid.delegate'/>
<link href='https://plus.google.com/xxxxx/posts' rel='publisher'/>
<link href='https://plus.google.com/xxxxx/about' rel='author'/>
<link href='https://plus.google.com/xxxxx' rel='me'/>
<b:if cond='data:blog.pageType in {"index"} and data:blog.homepageUrl == data:blog.url'><meta expr:content='data:blog.title' name='keywords'/></b:if>    
<b:if cond='data:blog.pageType in {"item","static_page"}'><meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + ", " + data:blog.pageTitle + ", " + data:blog.title' name='keywords'/></b:if>
<b:if cond='data:blog.pageType in {"archive"} or data:blog.searchLabel or data:blog.searchQuery'><meta content='noindex,nofollow' name='robots'/></b:if>
<b:if cond='data:blog.metaDescription'><meta expr:content='data:blog.metaDescription' name='description'/></b:if>
<!-- [ Social Media Meta Tag from Arlinadzgn ] -->
<meta expr:content='data:blog.pageTitle' property='og:title'/>
<b:if cond='data:blog.pageType == "item"'>
<meta content='article' property='og:type'/>
<b:else/>
<meta content='website' property='og:type'/>
</b:if>
<meta expr:content='data:blog.canonicalUrl' property='og:url'/>
<b:if cond='data:blog.postImageUrl'>
<meta expr:content='data:blog.postImageUrl' property='og:image'/>
<b:else/>
<b:if cond='data:blog.postImageThumbnailUrl'>
<meta expr:content='data:blog.postThumbnailUrl' property='og:image'/>
<b:else/>
<meta expr:content='data:blog.blogspotFaviconUrl' property='og:image'/>
</b:if></b:if>
<meta content='600' property='og:image:width'/>
<meta content='315' property='og:image:height'/>
<b:if cond='data:blog.metaDescription'><meta expr:content='data:blog.metaDescription' property='og:description'/></b:if>
<meta expr:content='data:blog.title' property='og:site_name'/>
<meta content='https://www.facebook.com/URL-PROFILE-FB' property='article:author'/>
<meta content='https://www.facebook.com/URL-FANPAGE-FB' property='article:publisher'/>
<b:if cond='data:blog.pageType in {"item","static_page"}'><meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName' property='article:section'/></b:if>
<meta content='xxxxx' property='fb:app_id'/>
<meta content='vocah.laknat' property='fb:admins'/>
<meta content='en_US' property='og:locale'/>
<meta content='en_GB' property='og:locale:alternate'/>
<meta content='id_ID' property='og:locale:alternate'/>
<meta content='summary' name='twitter:card'/>
<meta expr:content='data:blog.pageTitle' name='twitter:title'/>
<meta content='xxxxx' name='twitter:site'/>
<meta content='xxxxx' name='twitter:creator'/>
<link href='//fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto:400,700,700italic,400italic' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'/>
<link href='//maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.6.0/css/font-awesome.min.css' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'/>

/* CSS BASIC
   ======================================= */
*{-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box}
*:before,*:after{-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box}
a *{transition:all .5s;-moz-transition:all .5s;-webkit-transition:all .5s}
a:link{color:#219FDE;text-decoration:none;outline:none;}
a:visited{color:#219FDE;text-decoration:none}
a:hover{color:#E32;text-decoration:none}
a img{border:none;border-width:0;outline:none;vertical-align:middle;}
img,iframe{max-width:100%}
strong,b{font-weight:700}
cite,em,i{font-style:italic}
abbr,acronym{border-bottom:1px dotted;cursor:help}
sup,sub{vertical-align:baseline;position:relative;top:-.4em;font-size:86%}
sub{top:.4em}
small{font-size:86%}
kbd{font-size:80%;border:1px solid #999;padding:2px 5px;border-bottom-width:2px;border-radius:3px}
mark{background-color:#ffce00;color:#000}
p,blockquote,pre,table,figure,hr,form,ol,ul,dl{margin:1.5em 0}
hr{height:1px;border:none;background-color:#666}
/* heading */
h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{font-weight:700;line-height:normal;margin:0 0 .8em;letter-spacing:-.3px}
h1{font-size:200%}
h2{font-size:180%}
h3{font-size:160%}
h4{font-size:140%}
h5{font-size:120%}
h6{font-size:100%}
/* list */
ol,ul,dl{margin:.8em 0 .8em 3em}
ol{list-style:decimal outside}
ul{list-style:disc outside}
li{margin:.5em 0}
dt{font-weight:700}
dd{margin:0 0 .5em 2em}
/* form */
input,button,select,textarea{font:inherit;font-size:100%;line-height:normal;vertical-align:baseline}
textarea{display:block;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box}
pre,code{font-family:"Courier New",Courier,Monospace;color:inherit}
pre{white-space:pre;word-wrap:normal;overflow:auto}
/* blockquote */
blockquote{background:#F6F7F9;margin-left:2em;margin-right:2em;border-left:4px solid #DDDFE2;padding:1em;font-style:italic}
/* table */
table{max-width:100%}
table[border="1"] td,table[border="1"] th{vertical-align:top;text-align:left;font-size:13px;padding:3px 5px;border:1px solid #ededed}
table[border="1"] th{background:#F6F7F9}
table,img{max-width:100%;height:auto}

/*! usagilabs.css v1.0 | usagilabs.blogspot.com */
body {
  background: #f1f1f1 no-repeat fixed;
  background-image: url(//1.bp.blogspot.com/-K4PmI_ZokDA/V-t_VinPqbI/AAAAAAAAAFo/yxCf1tz14GQBDL908m_0b4eNq4QyH650QCLcB/s1600/rleft.png),url(//3.bp.blogspot.com/-7GGuqFf4Edw/V-t_VRMSJ6I/AAAAAAAAAFk/U2kMa7sMNloAU1G1NIa281xCW0Q8KoplQCLcB/s1600/rright.png);
  background-position: left -70px bottom, right -90px bottom;
  background-size: 350px;
  color:#222;
  font-family:Roboto, Segoe UI, Arial,sans-serif;
  font-size:15px;
  line-height:1.8;
  overflow-x:hidden;
  text-rendering:optimizeLegibility;
  -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing:grayscale;
}
.cl,.clear{clear:both}
.cl:after{visibility:hidden;display:block;font-size:0;content:" ";clear:both;height:0}
.fl{float:left;}
.fr{float:right;}
.tl{text-align:left;}
.tr{text-align:right;}
.dn{display:none;visibility:hidden;}
.eps{display:block;font-size:14px;color:#B9B9B9;padding-top:2px;font-weight:400}
.eps>b{text-transform:capitalize}
.viewers i{font-style:normal;}
::-webkit-scrollbar{width:7px;height:7px;background:#EEE;}
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:#999;}

/* WRAPPER
   ======================================= */
#wrapper{background:#fff;max-width:1050px;margin:30px auto 0;padding:0;border:1px solid #DAE0E2}
#content-wrapper{position:relative;margin:0 auto;padding:30px 35px;word-wrap:break-word}
#post-wrapper{padding-left:0}
#sidebar-wrapper{padding-right:0}

/* HEADER
   ======================================= */
#header-wrapper{margin:40px auto 0;max-width:1050px;position:relative}
#header{float:left;}
#header-wrapper a img{display:block}
#header-inner{position:relative;user-select:none;-webkit-user-select:none;-moz-user-select:none}
.header-logo{float:left;width:120px;margin-left:20px}
.header-title{top:20px;position:relative;left:20px;overflow:hidden}
.header img{height:auto}
.header h1.title,.header p.title{line-height:1.2;margin:0;font-size:35px;font-weight:700;letter-spacing:.4px;-webkit-font-smoothing:subpixel-antialiased;text-transform:uppercase}
.header .description{color:#332420;margin:0;padding:0;font-size:18px;font-weight:400;letter-spacing:1px}
.header a{color:#333}
.header a:hover{color:#09c}

/* NAV
   ======================================= */
#nav-wrapper{margin:0 auto;max-width:1050px;padding:0;position:relative;font-weight:700}
#nav-wrapper ul{padding:0 35px;list-style:none;margin:0}
#nav-wrapper li{margin:0;padding:0;float:left;display:inline;list-style:none;position:relative}
#nav-wrapper li > a{display:block;padding:0 30px;line-height:55px;text-decoration:none;color:#FFF;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:14px}
#nav-wrapper li ul{background:#555;background:#333;margin:0;padding:0;width:170px;height:auto;position:absolute;top:100%;left:0;z-index:10;display:none}
#nav-wrapper li ul li a{display:block;padding:0 20px;margin:0;text-decoration:none}
#nav-wrapper li li{display:block;float:none}
#nav-wrapper li:hover > ul{display:block}
#nav-wrapper li ul ul{left:100%;top:0}
#nav-wrapper li a span > .fa-angle-down{position:relative;right:-14%}
/* search */
#search-form{font-weight:700;margin:0 20px 0 0;display:block;float:right;position:relative;top:35px}
#search-box{background:#fff;line-height:42px;padding:0 20px;color:#666;margin:0;width:100%;min-width:300px;box-shadow:0 0 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.04);border:1px solid #d9d7dc;letter-spacing:.4px}
#search-button{position:absolute;top:0;right:0;line-height:44px;color:#fff;outline:0;margin:0;padding:0 20px;border:none;text-transform:uppercase;cursor:pointer}

/* WIDGET STYLE
   ======================================= */
.section{margin:0}
.sidebar .widget > h2{color:#fff;margin:0 0 15px;padding:10px;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:16px}
.sidebar .widget{padding:0 0 20px}
.sidebar .widget-content{}
.sidebar ul,.sidebar ol{list-style-type:none;margin:0;padding:0}
.sidebar li{margin:0;padding:3px 0;border-bottom:1px dotted #ddd}
.label-size-1,.label-size-2,.label-size-3,.label-size-4,.label-size-5{filter:alpha(100);opacity:10}
.label-size{display:block;float:left;background:#89C237;margin:0 3px 3px 0;color:#eee;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:700}
.label-size a,.label-size span{display:inline-block;color:#fff;padding:2px 3px}
.label-size:hover{background:#333}
.label-count{white-space:nowrap;padding-right:3px;margin-left:-3px}
.label-size{line-height:1.2}
.sidebar .PopularPosts .widget-content ul li{background:#fff;margin-bottom:15px;padding:0;border:0;position:relative;overflow:hidden}
.sidebar .PopularPosts .item-title{padding-bottom:0;overflow:hidden}
.sidebar .PopularPosts .item-title a{font-weight:700;font-size:16px;line-height:1.4;display:block;margin:0 auto}
.sidebar .PopularPosts .item-thumbnail{float:left;margin:0 15px 0 0;display:block;overflow:hidden;position:relative;max-width:55px}
.sidebar .PopularPosts .item-thumbnail a img{width:100%;display:block;margin:0;padding:0}
.sidebar .PopularPosts .item-snippet{color:#222;overflow:hidden;line-height:1.5;padding:0;position:relative;z-index:100;transition:all .7s;-moz-transition:all .7s;-webkit-transition:all .7s;word-break:break-all;display:none}
.profile-img{display:inline;opaciry:10;margin:0 6px 3px 0}

/* POST
   ======================================= */
.main-title{margin:0 0 13px;padding:0 0 3px;display:block;border-bottom:2px solid #ececec;letter-spacing:.5px}
.main-title i{padding-right:10px;font-size:14px}
.main-title span{text-transform:uppercase}
.main-title a:hover{-webkit-animation-name:tada;animation-name:tada}
.main-title a{font-size:12px;line-height:30px;padding-right:3px;color:#444}
.post-body{line-height:1.4}
.post-author{color:#999;font-style:italic;margin:15px 0 0;font-weight:700}
.post-author a{color:#999}
.post-author a:hover{border-bottom:1px dotted #ddd}
/* Status Bar */
.progress{height:20px;margin:5px 0 15px;overflow:hidden;background-color:#f5f5f5;border-radius:4px;-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.1);box-shadow:inset 0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.1)}
.progress-bar{width:0;height:100%;font-size:12px;line-height:20px;color:#fff;text-align:center;-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0 -1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.15);box-shadow:inset 0 -1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.15);-webkit-transition:width .6s ease;-o-transition:width .6s ease;transition:width .6s ease}
.progress-bar span{font-size:11px;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:700;line-height:22px}
.progress-bar-success{background-color:#5cb85c}
.progress-bar-info{background-color:#5bc0de}
.progress-bar-warning{background-color:#f0ad4e}
.progress-bar-danger{background-color:#d9534f}
.ani_stat>span{font-size:14px;color:#888}
.ani_stat b{font-size:16px;display:block}
/* ReAnime Post */
.reanime-post{padding-bottom:10px;margin-bottom:10px;border-bottom:1px solid #eaeaea}
.reanime-title{font-size:16px;letter-spacing:-.1px;margin-bottom:7px;display:-webkit-box;-webkit-line-clamp:2;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;max-height:38px;padding-bottom:0;overflow:hidden}
.reanime-thumb{float:left;max-width:70px;margin:0 15px 0 0}
.reanim-footer{color:#666;font-size:14px}
.reanim-footer>span>i{padding-right:5px;font-size:13px}
.reanim-footer>span{display:inline-block;padding-right:10px}

/* BLOG PAGINATION
   ======================================= */
#blog-pager{margin:20px auto;clear:both!important;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:700}
#blog-pager-next{float:left}
#blog-pager-prev{float:right}
.home-link{background:#89C237;display:inline-block;padding:2px 3px;color:#fff}
.pagination>li>a{display:block;color:#555}
.pagination>li{color:#333;float:left;font-size:13px;list-style:none;background:#fff;padding:0 15px;line-height:35px;margin:0 5px 5px 0;box-shadow:0 0 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.04);border:1px solid #d9d7dc}
.pagination>li.active a{color:#fff!important}

/* Footer Wrapper
   ======================================= */
#footer-wrapper{margin:0 auto;padding:25px 0;overflow:hidden;color:#B0B6B7;max-width:1050px}
#footer-wrapper a{color:#97A1A7}
.footer-left{float:left}
.footer-right{float:right}
.usagilabs_top{position:fixed;opacity:0;visibility:hidden;overflow:hidden;text-align:center;z-index:99;color:#fff;width:40px;height:40px;line-height:36px;right:25px;bottom:-25px;padding-top:2px;border-radius:5px;transition:all 0.5s ease-in-out;transition-delay:0.2s;border-radius:100% 100% 0 0}
.usagilabs_top:hover{color:#fff;transition:all 0.2s ease-in-out;transition-delay:0s}
.usagilabs_top.show{visibility:visible;cursor:pointer;opacity:1;bottom:25px;bottom:0}
.usagilabs_top i.fa{line-height:inherit}

/* Changin Color
   ======================================= */
#nav-wrapper,.sidebar .widget > h2,#search-button,#blog_popular .widget > h2,.usagilabs_top,.pagination>li.active{background:#665656}
.pagination>li>a:hover,.usagi-item>a:hover,#footer-wrapper a:hover,.pagination>li:hover a,.header h1.title, .header p.title,.sidebar .PopularPosts .item-title a,h2.reanime-title a,.header p.title a{color:#665656}
#blog_popular .popular-posts li,.pagination>li:hover,.pagination>li.active{border-color:#665656}
#nav-wrapper li:hover > a,#nav-wrapper a:hover,#nav-wrapper .active,#search-button:hover,.usagilabs_top:hover:hover{background:#4f4242}
h1.post-title,h2.post-title a{color:#222}
.progress-bar {background:#328EDC;}
#comments .comment-footer a:hover, #related-post .related-title:hover,.breadcrumbs a:hover,.post:hover h2.post-title a,h1.post-title a:hover,.PopularPosts .item-title a:hover,h2.blg-title a:hover,h2.recent-title a:hover,h2.pv-title a:hover,.main-title a:hover,h2.reanime-title a:hover{color:#219FDE;}

/* Media Bootstrap
   ======================================= */
@media screen and (min-width:768px)and (max-width:992px){.PopularPosts .item-thumbnail{max-height:165px}}@media screen and (min-width:560px)and (max-width:767px){.PopularPosts .widget-content ul{margin:0 -8px}.PopularPosts .widget-content ul li{float:left;width:47%;margin:1.5%}}@media screen and (min-width:480px)and (max-width:720px){.header-title{top:28%}.header h1.title,.header p.title{font-size:250%}.header .description{font-size:105%}}@media screen and (max-width:767px){#post-wrapper,#sidebar-wrapper{padding:0;width:100%}#footer-wrapper{text-align:center}.footer-left,.footer-right{float:none!important}}@media screen and (max-width:640px){#header-wrapper{margin:0 -15px}.header-title{position:static;padding:20px 40px 30px;background:#FFF;text-align:center}#header{float:none;}.header-logo{display:none;float:none}#nav-wrapper li:hover > a,#nav-wrapper a:hover,#nav-wrapper .active{background:inherit}#nav-wrapper li > a{padding:0}#nav-wrapper li ul{position:static;display:block;width:calc(100% - 30px);margin-left:0;background:rgba(0,0,0,0);border-left:4px solid #4F4242}#nav-wrapper li{float:none!important;display:block;margin-bottom:10px}#nav-wrapper li ul li a:hover{background:rgba(0,0,0,0);color:#68599e}#nav-wrapper li a span > .fa-angle-down{position:absolute;right:20px;top:24px;font-size:19px}.nav-menu{display:none}#mb_put{display:block;visibility:visible;-webkit-appearance:none;position:absolute;margin:0;width:100%;height:57px;z-index:100;cursor:pointer}#mb_put:checked ~ ul{display:block;margin:0}#mb_lab{display:block;visibility:visible;color:#fff;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:15px;padding:15px 35px;letter-spacing:.3px;cursor:pointer;margin:0}#mb_lab i{font-size:13px;padding-right:5px}#search-button{top:5px;right:5px;line-height:44px}#search-box{min-width:inherit;margin:5px;width:calc(100% - 15px)}#search-form{float:none!important;margin:0!important;top:0;background:#eee}.shr-btn a{width:100%;display:block}#comments .comment-child ul{padding-left:10px}}@media screen and (max-width:480px){#content-wrapper{padding:8%}.header h1.title,.header p.title{font-size:270%}.header .description{font-size:110%}#main-rl{display:none;visibility:hidden}#post-wrapper>b:first-child,.post-thumb,.blg-thumb,.main-title a{display:none}.animbox-info{background:#F9F9F9;margin:0 0 5px;padding:15px}.animbox-dl li a{font-size:0;color:rgba(0,0,0,0)}.animbox-dl li a:hover:after{color:#E32;}.animbox-dl li a:after{content:"Here";font-size:15px;color:#219FDE}.animbox-dl li:first-child span:last-child{display:none}.animbox-dl li:first-child span:first-child{border:0}.comment-children li ul li header img{display:none}.comment-children li ul li .comment-header,.comment-children li ul li .comment-content,.comment-children li ul li .comment-footer{margin-left:0!important}.animbox-thumb{width:100%!important}}@media screen and (max-width:560px){.share-buttons>a{width:100%;padding:15px;float:none;display:block}#related-post ul li{max-height:inherit!important}}@media screen and (max-width:320px){.pv-post{width:100%}.animbox-dl li:hover span{color:#333!important}.animbox-dl li a{position:absolute;left:0;width:100%!important;line-height:20px;top:7px}.animbox-dl li:first-child span:first-child{color:#fff}.animbox-dl li a:after{content:""}.animbox-dl li span:first-child{width:100%!important;border:0!important;color:#219FDE}.post-header>span{display:block}}
@media screen and (min-width:481px) and (max-width:600px){.pv-post{width:50%;}}
]]></b:skin>
<b:template-skin>
<![CDATA[
/* CSS TATA LETAK */
body#layout div.section{background:transparent;margin:0 0 15px 0;padding:0;border:none;box-sizing:border-box}
body#layout .section h4{display:none}
body#layout .widget-content{margin-top:0}
body#layout #header-wrapper,body#layout #content-wrapper{padding:0 0 0 0}
body#layout nav{display:none}
body#layout #post-wrapper{float:left;width:66%}
body#layout #sidebar-wrapper{float:left;margin-left:25px;width:30%}
]]></b:template-skin>
<b:if cond='data:blog.pageType in {"item","static_page"}'>
<style type='text/css'>/*<![CDATA[*/
/* IN POST
   ======================================= */
.breadcrumbs{padding:10px 15px;margin-bottom:20px;border:1px solid #eee;color:#A2A2A2}
.breadcrumbs>span>a{color:#666}
.breadcrumbs>i{padding:0 2px 0 5px}
.main-title i{font-size:19px;position:relative;top:0}
h1.post-title,.main-title{letter-spacing:-.3px;color:#676767;font-size:23px;margin:0}
.post-body{line-height:1.6}
.post-body a:first-child img,.post-body img:first-child{margin:0 auto -10px;text-align:center;display:block}
.post-header{color:#999;padding:6px 0;border-bottom:1px solid #eee;border-top:1px solid #eee;margin:10px 0 11px}
.post-header>span{padding-right:10px}
.post-header i{padding-right:5px;font-size:14px}
.shr-hd{margin:10px 0 0}
.post-label>a{display:inline-block;padding-right:5px}
.post-label>i{padding-right:5px}
.usagi-download{margin:15px auto;background:#FDFDFD;border:1px solid #EFEFEF}
.usagi-download>div{border-bottom:1px solid #eee;padding:10px 15px;white-space:nowrap;overflow-x:auto;overflow-y:hidden}
.usagi-download b{padding:10px 15px;text-transform:uppercase;width:100px;display:inline-block;position:relative;background:#665656;color:#fff;margin:-10px 10px -10px -16px;text-align:center}
.usagi-download b:before{content:"";width:100%;border-bottom:1px solid #564949;position:absolute;bottom:0;left:0;z-index:9}
.usagi-item>a{padding-right:15px;position:relative}
.usagi-item>a:after{content:"";border-right:1px solid #d3cede;text-shadow:inherit;height:12px;right:5px;top:3px;position:absolute}
.usagi-item>a:last-child:after{content:"";display:none}
.shr-btn{margin:20px auto 10px}
.shr-btn a i{padding-right:5px}
.shr-btn a{padding:7px 15px;margin-right:10px;border-radius:3px;float:left;font-size:13px;color:#fff;font-family:Montserrat,sans-serif;text-align:center;margin-bottom:8px}
.shr-fb{background:#3A5899}
.shr-tw{background:#6ACFED}
.shr-gp{background:#DE4B3F}
.shr-fb:hover{background:#2F477B}
.shr-tw:hover{background:#56A9C2}
.shr-gp:hover{background:#B43C33}
h4.main-title{margin-bottom:15px;font-size:21px}
#related-post{margin:5px 15px}
#related-post ul{list-style:none;margin:0;padding:0}
#related-post .related-item{padding:0 0 5px;margin-bottom:5px;overflow:hidden;position:relative;display:block;border-bottom:1px solid #eee}
#related-post .related-title{padding:2px 0;font-weight:700;color:#676767;line-height:1.6}
#related-post .related-title:before{content:"\f127";font-family:FontAwesome;padding-right:10px;font-weight:400;font-size:13px}
#comments{margin:15px 15px 10px}
#comment-list{margin:0;padding:0;list-style:none}
#comment-list li{list-style:none}
#comments .comment-author{padding:0}
#comments .comment-author img{width:40px;margin-right:15px;float:left;background:url(http://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-hIFnRzHpo8M/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAA8/5BFs9QKJAiQ/s55-c/photo.jpg);background-size:100%;border-radius:100%}
#comments .comment-metadata{padding-top:5px;font-size:14px}
#comments .comment-footer{margin:0}
#comments .comment-metadata a{color:#999}
#comments .comment-content p{margin:0;padding:15px 0;line-height:1.7;color:#666}
#comments .comment-child ul{margin:20px 0 20px 0;padding:0 0 0 20px;border-left:3px solid #EEE}
#comment-list>li>article{border:1px solid #eee;padding:25px}
#comments .comment-parent article{}
#comments .comment-header{border-bottom:1px solid #eee;padding-bottom:10px}
#comments .comment-parent>article>.comment-content,#comments .comment-parent>article>.comment-header,#comments .comment-parent>article>.comment-footer{margin-left:50px}
#comments .comment-parent>article>.comment-header>.comment-author img{margin-left:-50px}
#comments .comment-child ul li ul{margin-bottom:10px;margin-left:50px}
#comments .comment-child ul li ul li ul{margin:0 0 5px}
#comments .comment-footer a{position:relative;color:#444;padding:0 15px 0 0;line-height:27px;display:inline-block;font-weight:700;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:.3px;font-size:12px}
#comments .comment-footer a:first-child:before{content:"\f064";font-family:FontAwesome;padding-right:5px}
#comments .comment-footer a:last-child:before{content:"\f014";font-family:FontAwesome;padding-right:5px}
.animbox-fix{margin:0 0}
.animbox-post br{display:none;}
.animbox-info{line-height:1.7}
.animbox-info span:last-child{border:0;margin-bottom:0}
.animbox-info span{display:block;border-bottom:1px solid #eee;line-height:1.7;font-size:14px;white-space:nowrap;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;padding-bottom:5px;margin-bottom:4px}
.animbox-info span b{width:80px;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;white-space:nowrap;float:left;padding-right:2px}
.animbox-thumb{padding:0;float:left;width:155px;margin-right:15px}
.animbox-thumb img{margin:0!important}
.animbox-synopsis{margin:20px 0;border-left:4px solid #665656;padding-left:25px}
.animbox-synopsis p{margin:10px 0}
.animbox-synopsis p{margin:10px 0;letter-spacing:-.0px;word-break:break-word;text-align:justify}
.animbox-download>b,.animbox-synopsis>b{display:block;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:15px;border-bottom:1px solid #eee;margin-bottom:15px;padding-bottom:5px}
.animbox-dl{list-style:none;margin:0!important;padding:0!important}
.animbox-dl li{margin:0!important;border-left:1px solid #eee;border-right:1px solid #eee;border-bottom:1px solid #eee;padding:0 10px;position:relative;line-height:40px}
.animbox-dl li:first-child{background:#665656;line-height:40px;text-align:center;color:#fff;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:700;letter-spacing:.3px}
.animbox-dl li:first-child span:first-child{border-color:#544444}
.animbox-dl li:after{content:"";display:block;clear:both}
.animbox-dl li span:first-child{width:82%;float:left;white-space:nowrap;text-overflow:ellipsis;border-right:1px solid #eee;overflow:hidden;padding-right:5px}
.animbox-dl li a{float:left;text-align:center;width:18%}
.post-label{margin-top:20px;}
/*]]>*/
</style>
<b:else/>
<style type='text/css'>/*<![CDATA[*/
/* OUT POST / HOME
   ======================================= */
#post-wrapper .section .widget > h2{display:none}
.post{margin:0 0 25px;padding:0;overflow:hidden}
.post-home{}
.post-body{line-height:1.5;padding:5px 0;word-wrap:break-word;word-break:break-all;display:none}
h2.post-title{font-size:18px;line-height:1.3;margin:0 auto;letter-spacing:-.4px;white-space:nowrap;text-overflow:ellipsis;overflow:hidden}
.post-thumb{margin:0 25px 0 0;text-align:center;float:left;max-width:155px;position:relative}
.post-thumb img{width:100%;transition:.6s ease-in-out}
.post-box{overflow:hidden}
.post-thumb>a{display:block;position:relative;overflow:hidden}
.post-home:hover .post-thumb a:before{visibility:visible;opacity:1}
.post-home:hover .post-thumb a > i{visibility:visible;opacity:1;-webkit-animation-name:jello;animation-name:jello}
.post-thumb:hover a:active  i{-webkit-animation-name:tada;animation-name:tada}
.post-thumb>a:before{content:"";background:rgba(0,0,0,0.7);position:absolute;left:0;top:0;width:100%;height:100%;z-index:10;transition:.6s ease-in-out;opacity:0;visibility:hidden}
.post-thumb a > i{font-size:35px;color:#fff;top:40%;left:0;right:0;position:absolute;z-index:10;opacity:0;visibility:hidden}
.post-thumb>a>span{display:none;position:absolute;z-index:10;background:#8073AD;border:2px solid #8073AD;padding:0 15px;line-height:35px;color:#fff;font-weight:700;font-family:'Playfair Display',Serif;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:.5px;font-size:15px;top:43%;left:0;right:0;margin:auto;width:140px;opacity:0;visibility:hidden;transition:.6s ease-in-out}
.post-thumb a>span:hover{border-color:#FFF;background:transparent}
.post-header{font-size:14px;font-size:13px;padding:5px 0 0}
.post-header>div{line-height:1.4;padding:7px 0;border-bottom:1px solid #e6e6e6;white-space:nowrap;text-overflow:ellipsis;overflow:hidden}
.post-header>div:last-child{border-bottom:0;padding-bottom:0}
.post-header>div>i{width:15px;font-size:13px;color:#444;margin-right:3px}
.post-header>div>b{width:102px;width:75px;display:inline-block;position:relative;margin-right:5px}
.post-header>div>b:after{content:":";position:absolute;right:0}
.post-header a,.post-header{color:#ADADAD;color:#444}
.post-date abbr{text-decoration:none}
.post-label>a:after{content:","}
.post-label>a:last-child:after{content:""}
.post-label>a{padding-right:5px}
#main-rl{margin:0 0 20px}
.main-rl h2.title{display:none}
.blog-recent{margin:0 -5px}
.recent-post{padding:0 5px;position:relative}
h2.recent-title{position:absolute;bottom:0;font-size:15px;line-height:1.4;margin:0 auto;letter-spacing:-.3px;background:rgba(0,0,0,0.8);width:calc(100% - 10px);padding:10px;color:#fff}
h2.recent-title a,h2.pv-title a{color:#fff;text-overflow:ellipsis;display:block;display:-webkit-box;-webkit-line-clamp:2;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;max-height:38px;padding-bottom:0px;overflow:hidden}
.owl-carousel .owl-wrapper:after{content:".";display:block;clear:both;visibility:hidden;line-height:0;height:0}
.owl-carousel{display:none;position:relative;width:100%;width:calc(103% - 12px);-ms-touch-action:pan-y}
.owl-carousel .owl-wrapper{display:none;position:relative;-webkit-transform:translate3d(0px,0px,0px)}
.owl-carousel .owl-wrapper-outer{overflow:hidden;position:relative;width:100%}
.owl-carousel .owl-item{max-height:215px;float:left}
.recent-thumb img{height:100%;max-height:215px}
.owl-controls .owl-page,.owl-controls .owl-buttons div{cursor:pointer}
.grabbing{cursor:-webkit-grabbing}
.owl-controls{-webkit-user-select:none;-khtml-user-select:none;-moz-user-select:none;-ms-user-select:none;user-select:none;-webkit-tap-highlight-color:rgba(0,0,0,0)}

      reliably in JS because margins are not taken into account by any of
      clientWidth, offsetWidth or scrollWidth, so we don't force a minimum

</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='comment-form' var='post'/>
    <b:includable id='commentDeleteIcon' var='comment'/>
    <b:includable id='comment_count_picker' var='post'/>
    <b:includable id='comment_picker' var='post'/>
    <b:includable id='comments' var='post'/>
    <b:includable id='facebook_comments'><!-- KOMENTAR FACEBOOK -->
<b:if cond='data:blog.pageType == "item"'><div class='fbbox-comments' style='width:100%;margin-top:20px'><div class='fb-comments' data-num-posts='5' expr:data-href='data:blog.url'/></div></b:if>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='feedLinks'>
<b:if cond='data:blog.pageType != "item"'><!-- Blog feed links --><b:if cond='data:feedLinks'><div class='blog-feeds'><b:include data='feedLinks' name='feedLinksBody'/></div></b:if><b:else/><!--Post feed links --><div class='post-feeds'><b:loop values='data:posts' var='post'><b:if cond='data:post.allowComments'><b:if cond='data:post.feedLinks'><b:include data='post.feedLinks' name='feedLinksBody'/></b:if></b:if></b:loop></div></b:if>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='feedLinksBody' var='links'>
<div class='feed-links'><data:feedLinksMsg/><b:loop values='data:links' var='f'><a class='feed-link' expr:href='data:f.url' expr:type='data:f.mimeType' target='_blank'><data:f.name/> (<data:f.feedType/>)</a></b:loop></div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='iframe_comments' var='post'>
<b:if cond='data:post.allowIframeComments'><script expr:src='data:post.iframeCommentSrc' type='text/javascript'/><div class='cmt_iframe_holder' expr:data-href='data:post.canonicalUrl' expr:data-viewtype='data:post.viewType'/><b:if cond='data:post.embedCommentForm == "false"'><a expr:href='data:post.addCommentUrl' expr:onclick='data:post.addCommentOnclick'><data:postCommentMsg/></a></b:if></b:if>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='mobile-index-post' var='post'>
  <div class='mobile-date-outer date-outer'>

    <div class='mobile-post-outer'>
	  <b:if cond='data:post.thumbnailUrl'>
		<div class='mobile-index-thumbnail'>
		  <div class='Image'>
			<img expr:src='data:post.thumbnailUrl'/>
		  </div>
		</div>
		<b:else/>
		<div class='mobile-index-thumbnail'>
		  <div class='Image'>
			<img expr:alt='data:post.title' expr:title='data:post.title' src='http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zP87C2q9yog/UVopoHY30SI/AAAAAAAAE5k/AIyPvrpGLn8/w200-h150-c/picture_not_available.png'/>
		  </div>
		</div>
       </b:if>
      <a expr:href='data:post.url'>
        <h3 class='mobile-index-title entry-title' itemprop='name'>
          <data:post.title/>
        </h3>
	  </a>

        <div class='mobile-index-contents'>
          <div class='post-body'>
            <b:if cond='data:post.snippet'><data:post.snippet/></b:if>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div style='clear: both;'/>

    </div>
	
  </div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='mobile-main' var='top'>
    <!-- posts -->
    <div class='blog-posts hfeed'>

      <b:include data='top' name='status-message'/>

      <b:if cond='data:blog.pageType == "index"'>
        <b:loop values='data:posts' var='post'>
          <b:include data='post' name='mobile-index-post'/>
        </b:loop>
      <b:else/>
        <b:loop values='data:posts' var='post'>
          <b:include data='post' name='mobile-post'/>
        </b:loop>
      </b:if>
    </div>

   <b:include name='mobile-nextprev'/>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='mobile-nextprev'>
  <div class='blog-pager' id='blog-pager'>


 <b:if cond='data:blog.pageType != "item"'><b:if cond='data:blog.pageType != "static_page"'>
  <div class='blog-pager' id='blog-pager'><a class='js-load' href='javascript:;'>Muat Lagi</a></div>
 </b:if></b:if>




    <b:if cond='data:newerPageUrl'>
      <div class='mobile-link-button' id='blog-pager-newer-link'>
      <a class='blog-pager-newer-link' expr:href='data:newerPageUrl' expr:id='data:widget.instanceId + "_blog-pager-newer-link"' expr:title='data:newerPageTitle'>&lsaquo;</a>
      </div>
    </b:if>

    <b:if cond='data:olderPageUrl'>
      <div class='mobile-link-button' id='blog-pager-older-link'>
      <a class='blog-pager-older-link' expr:href='data:olderPageUrl' expr:id='data:widget.instanceId + "_blog-pager-older-link"' expr:title='data:olderPageTitle'>&rsaquo;</a>
      </div>
    </b:if>

    <div class='mobile-link-button' id='blog-pager-home-link'>
    <a class='home-link' expr:href='data:blog.homepageUrl'><data:homeMsg/></a>
    </div>

    <div class='mobile-desktop-link'>
      <a class='home-link' expr:href='data:desktopLinkUrl'><data:desktopLinkMsg/></a>
    </div>

  </div>
  <div class='clear'/>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='mobile-post' var='post'>
  <div class='date-outer'>
    <div class='date-posts'>
      <div class='post-outer'>

        <div class='post hentry uncustomized-post-template' itemscope='itemscope' itemtype='http://schema.org/BlogPosting'>
          <b:if cond='data:post.thumbnailUrl'>
            <meta expr:content='data:post.thumbnailUrl' itemprop='image_url'/>
          </b:if>
          <meta expr:content='data:blog.blogId' itemprop='blogId'/>
          <meta expr:content='data:post.id' itemprop='postId'/>

          <a expr:name='data:post.id'/>
          <b:if cond='data:post.title'>
            <h3 class='post-title entry-title' itemprop='name'>
              <b:if cond='data:post.link'>
                <a expr:href='data:post.link'><data:post.title/></a>
              <b:else/>
                <b:if cond='data:post.url'>
                  <b:if cond='data:blog.url != data:post.url'>
                    <a expr:href='data:post.url'><data:post.title/></a>
                  <b:else/>
                    <data:post.title/>
                  </b:if>
                <b:else/>
                  <data:post.title/>
                </b:if>
              </b:if>
            </h3>
          </b:if>

          <div class='post-header'>
            <div class='post-header-line-1'/>
          </div>

          <div class='post-body entry-content' expr:id='"post-body-" + data:post.id' itemprop='articleBody'>  
            <data:post.body/>
            pertama
            <div style='clear: both;'/> <!-- clear for photos floats -->
          </div>

          <div class='post-footer'>
            <div class='post-footer-line post-footer-line-1'>
              <span class='post-author vcard'>
                <b:if cond='data:top.showAuthor'>
                  <b:if cond='data:post.authorProfileUrl'>
                    <span class='fn' itemprop='author' itemscope='itemscope' itemtype='http://schema.org/Person'>
                      <meta expr:content='data:post.authorProfileUrl' itemprop='url'/>
                      <a expr:href='data:post.authorProfileUrl' rel='author' title='author profile'>
                        <span itemprop='name'><data:post.author/></span>
                      </a>
                    </span>
                  <b:else/>
                    <span class='fn' itemprop='author' itemscope='itemscope' itemtype='http://schema.org/Person'>
                      <span itemprop='name'><data:post.author/></span>
                    </span>
                  </b:if>
                </b:if>
              </span>

              <span class='post-timestamp'>
                <b:if cond='data:top.showTimestamp'>
                  <data:top.timestampLabel/>
                  <b:if cond='data:post.url'>
                    <meta expr:content='data:post.canonicalUrl' itemprop='url'/>
                    <a class='timestamp-link' expr:href='data:post.url' rel='bookmark' title='permanent link'><abbr class='published' expr:title='data:post.timestampISO8601' itemprop='datePublished'><data:post.timestamp/></abbr></a>
                  </b:if>
                </b:if>
              </span>

              <span class='post-comment-link'>
                <b:if cond='data:blog.pageType != "item"'>
                  <b:if cond='data:blog.pageType != "static_page"'>
                    <b:if cond='data:post.allowComments'>
                      <b:include data='post' name='comment_count_picker'/>
                    </b:if>
                  </b:if>
                </b:if>
              </span>
            </div>

            <div class='post-footer-line post-footer-line-2'>
              <b:if cond='data:top.showMobileShare'>
                <div class='mobile-link-button goog-inline-block' id='mobile-share-button'>
                  <a href='javascript:void(0);'><data:shareMsg/></a>
                </div>
              </b:if>
              <b:if cond='data:top.showDummy'>
                <div class='goog-inline-block dummy-container'><data:post.dummyTag/></div>
              </b:if>
            </div>

          </div>
        </div>

        <b:if cond='data:blog.pageType == "static_page"'>
          <b:include data='post' name='comment_picker'/>
        </b:if>
        <b:if cond='data:blog.pageType == "item"'>
          <b:include data='post' name='comment_picker'/>
        </b:if>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='nextprev'>
<div class='blog-pager' id='blog-pager'>
<b:if cond='data:newerPageUrl'><span id='blog-pager-newer-link'><a class='blog-pager-newer-link' expr:href='data:newerPageUrl' expr:id='data:widget.instanceId + "_blog-pager-newer-link"' expr:title='data:newerPageTitle'><data:newerPageTitle/></a></span></b:if>
<b:if cond='data:olderPageUrl'><span id='blog-pager-older-link'><a class='blog-pager-older-link' expr:href='data:olderPageUrl' expr:id='data:widget.instanceId + "_blog-pager-older-link"' expr:title='data:olderPageTitle'><data:olderPageTitle/></a></span>
</b:if>
<a class='home-link' expr:href='data:blog.homepageUrl'><data:homeMsg/></a>
<b:if cond='data:mobileLinkUrl'><div class='blog-mobile-link'><a expr:href='data:mobileLinkUrl'><data:mobileLinkMsg/></a></div></b:if>
<div class='clear'/>
</div>
</b:includable>

    <b:includable id='post' var='post'>
<b:switch var='data:blog.pageType'>
<b:case value='static_page'/>
<!-- Posting halaman statis -->
<article class='post hentry post-static cl' itemprop='blogPost' itemscope='itemscope' itemtype='http://schema.org/BlogPosting'>
<b:if cond='data:post.title'><h1 class='post-title entry-title'><b:if cond='data:post.link'><a expr:href='data:post.link'><data:post.title/></a><b:else/><b:if cond='data:post.url'><b:if cond='data:blog.url != data:post.url'><a expr:href='data:post.url'><data:post.title/></a><b:else/><data:post.title/></b:if><b:else/><data:post.title/></b:if></b:if></h1></b:if>
<div class='post-body entry-content' expr:id='"post-body-" + data:post.id'>
  <data:post.body/>
  
  kedua
  <div style='clear: both;'/></div> 
</article>
<b:case value='item'/>
<!-- Posting halaman item -->
<article class='post hentry post-item cl' itemprop='blogPost' itemscope='itemscope' itemtype='http://schema.org/BlogPosting'>
<b:if cond='data:post.firstImageUrl'><meta expr:content='data:post.firstImageUrl' itemprop='image'/></b:if>
<a expr:name='data:post.id'/>
<b:if cond='data:post.title'>
<h1 class='post-title entry-title' itemprop='name headline'>
<b:if cond='data:post.link'>
<a expr:href='data:post.link'><data:post.title/></a>
<b:else/>
<b:if cond='data:post.url'>
<b:if cond='data:blog.url != data:post.url'>
<a expr:href='data:post.url'><data:post.title/></a>
<b:else/>
<data:post.title/>
</b:if>
<b:else/>
<data:post.title/>
</b:if>
</b:if>
</h1>
</b:if>
<header class='post-header'>
<span class='post-auth'><i class='fa fa-user'/> By <b:if cond='data:top.showAuthor'><b:if cond='data:post.authorProfileUrl'><span class='author-info'><span class='vcard'><span class='fn' itemprop='author' itemscope='itemscope' itemtype='http://schema.org/Person'><meta expr:content='data:post.authorProfileUrl' itemprop='url'/><a class='g-profile profile-block' expr:href='data:post.authorProfileUrl' rel='author' title='author profile'><span itemprop='name'><data:post.author/></span></a></span></span></span></b:if></b:if>, </span>
<span class='post-date'><i class='fa fa-calendar'/> Released at <b:if cond='data:top.showTimestamp'><span class='date-block'><abbr class='updated published' expr:title='data:post.timestampISO8601' itemprop='datePublished'><data:post.timestamp/></abbr></span></b:if></span>
<span class='post-view'><i class='fa fa-eye'/> <span class='viewers'><i class='wpviewload wpview' id='postviews'>0</i> View</span></span>
</header>
<div class='shr-btn shr-hd cl'>
<a class='shr-fb' expr:href='"http://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=" + data:post.url' target='_blank' title='Share to Facebook'><i class='fa fa-facebook'/> Share on Facebook</a>
<a class='shr-tw' expr:href='"http://twitter.com/share?url=" + data:post.url' target='_blank' title='Share to Twitter'><i class='fa fa-twitter'/> Share on Tweet</a>
<a class='shr-gp' expr:href='"https://plus.google.com/share?url=" + data:post.url' target='_blank' title='Share to Google+'><i class='fa fa-google-plus'/> Share on Google+</a>
</div>
<div class='post-body entry-content cl' expr:id='"post-body-" + data:post.id' itemprop='description articleBody'>
<!-- iklan di bawah judul taruh di sini -->
<data:post.body/>
  ketiga
  <script type='text/javascript'>

//<![CDATA[

$(".separator a:has(img)").each(function() { $(this).replaceWith($(this).children()); });

//]]>

</script>

<!-- iklan di bawah postingan taruh di sini -->
</div>
<div class='post-label'><i class='fa fa-tags'/><b>Tags</b>: <b:if cond='data:post.labels'><b:loop values='data:post.labels' var='label'><a class='label-block' expr:href='data:label.url' rel='tag'>#<data:label.name/></a></b:loop></b:if>
</div>
<div class='shr-btn shr-ft cl'>
<a class='shr-fb' expr:href='"http://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=" + data:post.url' target='_blank' title='Share to Facebook'><i class='fa fa-facebook'/> Share on Facebook</a>
<a class='shr-tw' expr:href='"http://twitter.com/share?url=" + data:post.url' target='_blank' title='Share to Twitter'><i class='fa fa-twitter'/> Share on Tweet</a>
<a class='shr-gp' expr:href='"https://plus.google.com/share?url=" + data:post.url' target='_blank' title='Share to Google+'><i class='fa fa-google-plus'/> Share on Google+</a>
</div>
</article>
<!-- end item -->
<b:default/>

<article class='post hentry post-home cl' itemprop='blogPost' itemscope='itemscope' itemtype='http://schema.org/BlogPosting'>
<b:if cond='data:post.firstImageUrl'><meta expr:content='data:post.firstImageUrl' itemprop='image'/></b:if>
<div class='post-thumb animated'>
<a expr:href='data:post.url'><i class='fa fa-thumbs-up animated'/>
<b:if cond='data:post.thumbnailUrl'>
<div class='img-thumbnail'><img expr:alt='data:post.title' expr:data-src='resizeImage(data:post.thumbnailUrl, 155, "1:1")' expr:title='data:post.title' height='155' src='data:image/png;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=' width='155'/></div><b:else/><div class='img-thumbnail'><img expr:alt='data:post.title' expr:title='data:post.title' height='155' src='http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ltyYh4ysBHI/U04MKlHc6pI/AAAAAAAADQo/PFxXaGZu9PQ/s155-c/no-image.png' width='155'/></div>
</b:if>
</a>
</div>
<div class='post-box'>
<a expr:name='data:post.id'/>
<b:if cond='data:post.title'>
<h2 class='post-title entry-title' itemprop='name headline'>
<b:if cond='data:post.link'>
<a expr:href='data:post.link'><data:post.title/></a>
<b:else/>
<b:if cond='data:post.url'>
<b:if cond='data:blog.url != data:post.url'>
<a expr:href='data:post.url'><data:post.title/></a>
<b:else/>
<data:post.title/>
</b:if>
<b:else/>
<data:post.title/>
</b:if>
</b:if>

</b:if>
<header class='post-header'>
<div class='post-auth'><i class='fa fa-user'/> <b>Posted</b><b:if cond='data:top.showAuthor'><b:if cond='data:post.authorProfileUrl'><span class='author-info'><span class='vcard'><span class='fn' itemprop='author' itemscope='itemscope' itemtype='http://schema.org/Person'><meta expr:content='data:post.authorProfileUrl' itemprop='url'/><a class='g-profile profile-block' expr:href='data:post.authorProfileUrl' rel='author' title='author profile'><span itemprop='name'><data:post.author/></span></a>, </span></span></span></b:if></b:if></div>
<div class='post-date'><i class='fa fa-calendar'/> <b>Release</b><b:if cond='data:top.showTimestamp'><span class='date-block'><abbr class='updated published' expr:title='data:post.timestampISO8601' itemprop='datePublished'><data:post.timestamp/></abbr></span></b:if></div>
<div class='post-view'><i class='fa fa-eye'/> <b>View</b><span class='viewers'><i class='wpviewload wpview' id='postviews'>0</i> View</span>
</div>

</header>
<div class='post-body entry-content cl dn' expr:id='"post-body-" + data:post.id' itemprop='articleBody description'><div expr:id='"summary" + data:post.id'><data:post.snippet/></div></div>
</div>
</article>

</footer>

<b:if cond='data:blog.pageType != "item" and data:blog.pageType != "static_page"'>
<div class='main-blog cl'>
<b class='main-title'><i class='fa fa-bars'/><span>News Magz</span> <a class='fr animated' href='/search/label/Blog'>View All</a></b>
<b:section class='main-blg' id='main-blg' preferred='yes'>
  <b:widget id='AdSense1' locked='false' title='' type='AdSense'>
    <b:includable id='main'>
  <div class='widget-content'>
    <data:adCode/>
    <b:include name='quickedit'/>
  </div>
</b:includable>
  </b:widget>
  <b:widget id='AdSense2' locked='false' title='' type='AdSense'>
    <b:includable id='main'>
  <div class='widget-content'>
    <data:adCode/>
    <b:include name='quickedit'/>
  </div>
</b:includable>
  </b:widget>
</b:section>
</div>
<div class='main-video cl'>
<b class='main-title'><i class='fa fa-film'/><span>Latest PV Realase</span> <a class='fr animated' href='/search/label/PV'>View All</a></b>
<b:section class='main-pv' id='main-pv' preferred='yes'/>
</div>
</b:if>
</div> <!-- post wrapper end -->
<aside class='col-md-4 col-sm-4 col-xs-4 col-mb-4' id='sidebar-wrapper' itemscope='itemscope' itemtype='http://schema.org/WPSideBar'>
<b:section class='sidebar' id='sidebar' preferred='yes'>
  <b:widget id='PopularPosts1' locked='false' title='Entri Popular' type='PopularPosts' version='1'>
    <b:widget-settings>
      <b:widget-setting name='numItemsToShow'>3</b:widget-setting>
      <b:widget-setting name='showThumbnails'>true</b:widget-setting>
      <b:widget-setting name='showSnippets'>true</b:widget-setting>
      <b:widget-setting name='timeRange'>LAST_YEAR</b:widget-setting>
    </b:widget-settings>
    <b:includable id='main'>
  <b:if cond='data:title != ""'><h2><data:title/></h2></b:if>
  <div class='widget-content popular-posts'>
    <ul>
      <b:loop values='data:posts' var='post'>
      <li>
        <b:if cond='!data:showThumbnails'>
          <b:if cond='!data:showSnippets'>
            <!-- (1) No snippet/thumbnail -->
            <a expr:href='data:post.href'><data:post.title/></a>
          <b:else/>
            <!-- (2) Show only snippets -->
            <div class='item-title'><a expr:href='data:post.href'><data:post.title/></a></div>
            <div class='item-snippet'><data:post.snippet/></div>
          </b:if>
        <b:else/>
          <!-- (3) Show only thumbnails or (4) Snippets and thumbnails. -->
          <div expr:class='data:showSnippets ? "item-content" : "item-thumbnail-only"'>
            <b:if cond='data:post.featuredImage.isResizable or data:post.thumbnail'>
              <div class='item-thumbnail'>
                <a expr:href='data:post.href' target='_blank'>
                  <b:with value='data:post.featuredImage.isResizable                                  ? resizeImage(data:post.featuredImage, 330, "1:1")                                  : data:post.thumbnail' var='image'>
                    <img alt='' border='0' expr:src='data:image'/>
                  </b:with>
                </a>
              </div>
            </b:if>
            <div class='item-title'><a class='eps' expr:href='data:post.href'><data:post.title/></a></div>
            <b:if cond='data:showSnippets'>
              <div class='item-snippet'><data:post.snippet/></div>
            </b:if>
          </div>
          <div style='clear: both;'/>
        </b:if>
      </li>
      </b:loop>
    </ul>
  </div>
</b:includable>
  </b:widget>
</b:section>
</aside> <!-- sidebar wrapper end -->
<div class='clear'/>
</div> <!-- end content-wrapper -->

</div>
